description: The Avionics Passenger Counter (APC) shall support on-board computational functional requirements using an Field Programmable Logic Device (FPGA).
The APC shall provide an Entry/Exit motion detection.
﻿The APC shall support a entry mechanism to allow for making headcount adjustments/corrections.
﻿The APC shall support a display to show the current passenger headcount.
The APC shall provide a PIC Microcontroller-based method for implementing fault monitoring and a ARINC A429 transmitter interface to the aircraft maintenance computer.
The Avionics Passenger Counter (APC) shall support PIC microprocessor to ARINC429 interface functional requirements using an Field Programmable Logic Device (FPGA).
